Room.Name: Private Altar
Room.ShortDescription: This is the smaller but private altar to Maglubyet.
Room.LongDescription: Though not as large and ornate as the altar on the other side of the curtain, this one also has straps and an urn for collecting blood. The urn here looks to made of gold studded with gems, and sparkles in the dancing candle light. Pillows and furs line a niche in the wall, evidently a love nest for someone, and also high enough to see what happens at the altar. A great piece of smoky, amber glass covers one wall.
